amendment.description: Amendment sought to add income equality to the list of variables used to determine the economic impact of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 112-383 to add income equality among the variables used to determine the economic impact of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fudge amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 243 (Roll no. 26).
